Primary.description: Reflects the text.primary variable from the theme object

Secondary.description: Reflects the text.secondary variable from the theme object

Disabled.description: Reflects the text.disabled variable from the theme object

Main.description: Reflects the Primary/Main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the primary.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the primary.light variable from the theme object

Main.description: Reflects the secondary.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

Darker.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

Lightest.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the secondary.dark variable from the theme object

onSecondary.description: Reflects the secondary.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the error.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the error.light variable from the theme object

onError.description: Reflects the error.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

Main.description: Reflects the warning.main variable from the theme object

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the warning.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the warning.light variable from the theme object

onWarning.description: Reflects the warning.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color

Dark.description: Used for hover states. Reflects the info.dark variable from the theme object

Light.description: Reflects the info.light variable from the theme object

onInfo.description: Reflects the info.contrast variable from the theme object. Color that keeps a contrast ratio above AA when XX.main is used as a bg. color
